DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Moves the entity to the given location, then turns on a sonar at the given depth. The sonar is left on for the given duration.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>location</myVariableName> <myType>location</myType> <myLabel>Location</myLabel> <myToolTip>Location of sonar dip</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>duration</myVariableName> <myType>time</myType> <myLabel>Duration: </myLabel> <myToolTip>Time to spend dipping sonar</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>sonarType</myVariableName> <myType>combo</myType> <myLabel>Sonar Type: </myLabel> <myToolTip>The type of sonar to use</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Active</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Active;Passive</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>sonarDepth</myVariableName> <myType>depth</myType> <myLabel>Sonar Depth</myLabel> <myToolTip>Sets sonar to this depth</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
